AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Badlands Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While other kittens got fat in the bustling cities of the south, [PAWN_nameDef] struggled to survive in the harsh badlands of the North. Instead of yarn, they played with tumbleweed and knives.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fennec Fox Chaser
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Contrary to the expectation, there was a lot of life in the Savannah. In part it was due to [PAWN_nameDef] chasing after every fennec fox they saw, but also the lions the tribe had to fend off.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Senche racer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Few kittens were as iconic as [PAWN_nameDef] and their Senche-raht friend. They would ride ahead of their band, and alert them when unwary travellers were nearby.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hunter Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up amongst the Khajiiti tribes, unaware of the outside world. They spent their days learning how to hunt to provide for the clan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Werelion hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While the other khajiit feared the werelions, [PAWN_nameDef] took on the challenge. With arrows of silver, they hunted the beasts down. Unfortunately, one of them was their spouse.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Tribe Medic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Few knew the local flora as well as [PAWN_nameDef], carefully picking out which plant could heal a rash and which was lethal poison. Of course, the most important plant was catnip and moon sugarcane.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Curious Tribal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: One day, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave their tribe to explore the world. When they arrived in the cities, they couldn't comprehend how they could eat something this sweet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scaredy-cat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had always been a skittish cat, ready to pounce at anything that came too close. Once they nearly ruined the relation with another tribe after they shot one of their hunters.
